ygData.subject: Re: Trade In
ygData.msgSnippet: ... My sis just sold one (on the cheap side I thought) for about 320pp plus 2 bits of bronze armour.  Did some negotiating with a mage type who wanted to trade
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 18 Aug 1999 14:12:15 -0500, you wrote:

>From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
>I been auctioning one for the past 2 nights on Innoruuk - looking for 800pp
>(will take less) or owner wanted a trade for a Staff of Writhing and 100p
>-- so far - no takers - too many steins have been quested me thinks
>
>Sylly

My sis just sold one (on the cheap side I thought) for about 320pp
plus 2 bits of bronze armour. Did some negotiating with a mage type
who wanted to trade it for some gator armour, but since she'd never
heard of the stuff (yes it's true) she asked for too much and think he
got huffed by that. Oh well, he said he could pick one up for 600pp
in the auction easy.

--

Saldara
High Elf Wizard (20), Mith Marr server

Melaniel
Wood Elf Bard (11), Mith Marr server
